input.sentences: i grabbed some snacks for the game tonight .
i brought a lot of grains for everyone .
i also made some food for dinner during the game .
i wanted to make sure it could be eaten with your hands .
so i put it in some pita bread .
output.sentences: Tonight we decided to grab some snacks.
We brought a lot of grains so we can have a balanced diet.
Cooking is like a game, in that you have to prepare a lot of food for dinner.
Your hands are the sole tools for making the food and will be eaten by various people.
Try and make pita bread, a delicious handmade food.
